data.name: MCOBIT
data.description:
MCOBIT applies blockchain technology to provide users with various convenience services such as real-time hotel reservations, airline reservations, and online shopping. MCOBIT provides convenience services through an integrated proprietary development platform that connects suppliers and consumers. In a single market that provides a complete database of tourism services including availability and pricing information, mcobit offers the lowest fares, hotel reservations, and integrated shopping mall access from a desktop or mobile app through the TRC20 compatible token, MCT Utility Token.

MCOBIT is an innovative platform service that makes travel and online shopping safe, fast and easy for users. We provide platform services by integrating into search engines through partnerships with travel and shopping mall companies.
With the platform operated by MCOBIT, anyone can easily enjoy travel and shopping benefits at an economical and competitive cost. A one-stop booking solution for economical and convenient use of travel and shopping using blockchain technology services, you can use all airline search, airline ticketing, and hotel reservation services in one place.
In addition, you can freely enjoy shopping through online shopping malls affiliated with domestic and overseas.

Our platform services are not only economical and convenient to use, but also offer additional cashback benefits while traveling and shopping at low cost.

The mcobit Cashback Program provides users with a loyalty program that allows them to receive various promotional benefits and rewards such as free tickets, travel, and MCT tokens through the membership membership service (free).

The mcotra.com search engine provides air ticketing reservations and hotel reservations at the lowest possible cost by comparing and searching almost all airline and hotel service providers around the world, and through the mcomk.com platform. Through a one-stop integrated platform service for products in major online shopping malls or open markets at home and abroad, you can save money economically while shortening the time required for searching.
